daoResponse.suggestion: Interesting DAO concept! Let me ask a few questions: 🗳️
reasons: ⛓️ Full on-chain ideal for DAO governance
⚠️ Consider potential latency for consensus operations
clarificationQuestions: What type of governance decisions will the DAO handle?
How large is your expected community size?
Do you need multi-signature treasury features?
